title: Bug 6125 - JAR packager reports open files very late
description: When I press finish to create a JAR file, the JAR creation fails with the error message 'JAR creation failed: Unsaved Editors'.
OB: When I press finish to create a JAR file with unsaved editors, the JAR creation fails and the error message 'JAR creation failed: Unsaved Editors' is displayed.
EB: I should be able to create a JAR file with unsaved editors. If the JAR creation fails due to unsaved editors, there should be a dialog prompting me to save the unsaved files before proceeding with the JAR creation.
SR:
1. Open the JAR packager wizard.
2. Ensure there are unsaved editors.
3. Enter all required fields in the wizard.
4. Press the finish button to create the JAR file.
